job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI features into a complete product, spanning both front-end and back-end, and taking full ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the architectural design and coding of web applications, emphasizing the integration of front-end and back-end, and the use of AI to improve user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the end-to-end responsibility for the development lifecycle, a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the integration of different development aspects (front-end/back-end) to build complete and scalable software.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering process of translating abstract ideas into concrete, developed products, requiring full-stack expertise.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves working directly with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) to create new AI-powered tools and features, which falls under model development and application of AI technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development and delivery of AI applications with a focus on their impact and outcomes, aligning with model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase connects the technical work to the impact on users and the broader educational technology landscape, indicating an understanding of business needs and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding stakeholder needs and aligning technical solutions with learner requirements, demonstrating business understanding and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the strategic integration of AI features within the product and their impact on users, showing business context awareness.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: While primarily a software engineering task, the emphasis on 'comprehensive and scalable solutions' implies an understanding of the business need for robust and maintainable products.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on innovation and building new applications implies understanding the business strategy of staying competitive and forward-thinking.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with diverse teams and the importance of clear communication of complex ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the necessity of collaboration with various roles to ensure impactful and user-centered solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for continuous learning and application of new advancements in the field.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes innovation and taking ownership of the entire product development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This directly states the expectation of taking ownership of technical projects and the full development process.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the role's focus on driving innovation and building new applications.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (1.A.1), such as architecting and coding web applications, integrating front-end and back-end systems, and taking ownership of the entire development process. While it involves working with cutting-edge AI technologies like LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) for creating new features (1.B.1), the primary focus is on integrating these AI capabilities into broader web applications and products, rather than deep model development or specialization in AI research. The role requires a balanced blend of software engineering and AI integration, with a strong emphasis on the former, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the expectations, explicitly stating the blend of software engineering and AI integration, and contrasting it with specialized AI roles. The responsibilities and the 'what you will NOT be doing' section provide strong evidence for the classification.
